text: @realDonaldTrump People are dying in America everyday from Covid-19 and our country is in turmoil over 400 years of systemic racism, and this asshole is concerned with school/airport names. #TrumpTraitor #TrumpIsARacist #COVIDIOTS #coronavirus #Covid_19 #COVID #TrumpIsNotWell #TrumpIsAnIdiot

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
